name: TKG-MyVMware-User
description: MyVMware.com User Name. Used to download the TKG binaries.

name: TKG-Git-Repository
description: GIT Repository address. Used to store configuration for TKG and Kubernetes

name: TKG-vRA-Password
description: vRealize Automation Password. Used for the on-boarding tasks

name: TKG-Docker-Host
description: Docker host FQDN. Used to run an SSH task to execute the TKG bootstrapping.

name: TKG-vCenter-FQDN
description: vCenter FQDN.  Used by GOVC to create folders and deploy templates. Also used by TKG to deploy VMs.

name: TKG-Docker-Host-Password
description: Docker host password. Used to SSH to the Docker host

name: TKG-vCenter-Password
description: vCenter Password. Used by GOVC to create folders and deploy templates. Also used by TKG to deploy VMs.

name: TKG-Docker-Host-User
description: Docker host username. Used to SSH to the Docker host

name: TKG-vRA-Username
description: vRealize Automation User Name. Used for the on-boarding tasks

name: TKG-vCenter-Username
description: vCenter User. Used by GOVC to create folders and deploy templates. Also used by TKG to deploy VMs.

name: TKG-MyVMware-Password
description: MyVMware.com User Password. Used to download the TKG binaries.

name: TKG-vRA-URL
description: vRealize Automation URL (https://FQDN). Used for the on-boarding tasks.
